plugin.name: ContextStats
plugin.title: Context Stats
plugin.desc: Display lists of tracks, albums or artists sorted by statistics from the context menus of artists, albums, genres, years and playlists. Screenshots and more information on the GitHub page.
plugin.creator: AF
